attributes.action: FREE parking & and FREE travel on ALL TRAINS and BUSES on producing their i.d.
attributes.additional_details: They deserve this as payback and appreciation for what they are doing in this very difficult & challenging time during this pandemic of COVID-19
attributes.background: Our wonderful NHS are doing a grand Job, where ever in the uk 🇬🇧, lets circulate this to get them FREE parking at ALL NHS sites and FREE travel on ALL TRAINS and BUSES on producing their i.d.
